abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Yandex Smart Home is allowed.

error.conflicting_entity_includes: Included entities set intersects with excluded entities set
error.customization_unavailable_with_empty_inc: Unable to initiate custom configuration without specifying entities
error.empty_entity_id: One of provided entity IDs is empty
error.filter_without_entities: Configured filter will not yield any entities. Add entities to include, or restart config flow to change domains.

custom_properties.description:
Specify one of the following for required properties:
- _empty_ — Determine automatically
- `attribute` — Current entity attribute
- `domain.id` — Other entity's state
- `domain.id.attribute` — Attribute of other entity

Page {page} of {pages}
custom_properties.title: Properties configuration

custom_toggles.description:
Specify one of the following for required toggles:
- _empty_ — Determine automatically
- `domain.id` â€” Other entity's state

Page {page} of {pages}
custom_toggles.title: Toggles configuration

selective.description:
Exposes/hides certain entities, overriding previous domain configuration. You can leave these fields empty by default.

By enabling included entities customization you will be able to enable additional features. You can read up on the list of current features on the [integration's GitHub page](https://github.com/alryaz/hass-component-yandex-smart-home/blob/master/README.md).
selective.title: Selective entity exposure

supported.description: Select entity domains which you would like to expose to Yandex Smart Home service. This acts as a wildcard for all entities. You will be able to add per-entity filters later during setup.
supported.title: Configure entities for Yandex exposure

unsupported.description: The following domains are not briefly supported by Yandex, and therefore will remain untested until official support is added. Enable them at your own risk!
unsupported.title: Unsupported entity domains

user.description:
The following domains are exposed to Yandex by default: {domains}

Should you be willing make any changes, tick the box below before continuing.
user.title: Yandex Smart Home Setup
